devdoc.title: Splitting of Alice' ethereum for the Blockstars course.

methods.constructor: In the constructor we set the owner of the contract to be the initial deployer This could be Alice.

getBalance().notice: This gets the balance of the contract. This is also at the same time the wallet of the contract owner.

splitit().notice: Sends half of a selected ammount of the contracts ether to the two splitters (splitter1 and splitter2)  QUESTION: How small can the ammount be - could there be a rounding problem?

splitterSetTargets(address,address).notice: Sets addresses of Splitter customers  QUESTION: Should I check if the parameters are empty here? QUESTION: Does it actually save transaction space to check if the new spltters are the same as before?
